welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Melrose, where history meets charm and adventure awaits! Get ready to discover our quaint New England town and all it has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest and smallest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport is a small, single-story building with basic amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and private flights at Hanscom Field Airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private flights and offers exclusive amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lawrence Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: WiFi is free for all passengers and has a strong signal throughout the airport.
